name: FusionLab-learn / XTFT
description: Flexible framework for next-gen time-series forecasting with Temporal Fusion Transformer (TFT) and XTFT variants; calibrated, uncertainty-aware, and physics-aware hooks (TensorFlow/Keras).

name: k-diagram
description: Polar diagnostics package for forecast uncertainty—coverage, calibration, and severity (CAS)—to make probabilistic models interpretable.

name: hwm — Adaptive Hammerstein-Wiener Modeling Toolkit
description: Toolkit for adaptive Hammerstein-Wiener system modeling (nonlinear + linear blocks) with a scikit-learn-friendly API for regression/classification/TS.

name: gofast — AIO Machine Learning Package
description: All-in-one ML utilities designed to streamline data science workflows—fast helpers for preprocessing, modeling, and evaluation.

name: watex — Machine Learning for Water Exploration
description: Python library for groundwater exploration: integrates DC resistivity (ERP/VES), EM, geology, and ML for siting wells, predicting yields, and restoring noisy EM signals.

name: hydro-learn — Intelligent Solver for Hydrogeology
description: Methods and workflows to reduce data-collection costs for K, guide drilling locations, and predict well water content using ML.

name: pyCSAMT
description: Python toolbox for AMT/CSAMT: end-to-end processing, SEG-EDI/Zonge compatibility, and 2D/3D geophysical inversion workflows.

name: kalfeat — Fast Detection of Geo-Electrical Features
description: ML pipeline to predict groundwater flow rate from geology and DC resistivity (ERP/VES); automates optimal drilling-site selection and reduces dry-well risk.
